. Game Summary

Professor Olivier Leroux, a well known archaeologist, 
is gone without a trace. The only person who can find 
him is his niece Sylvie. Frustrated with the police 
attempts to find her uncle she decides to commence her 
own private investigation. Which ultimately takes her 
to the ruins of an ancient church on Malta. It was there, 
that the scholar encounters a dark secret from biblical 
times. Become Sylvie Leroux and find out what happened to 
the professor. Who are the people who wanted him to disappear? 
And uncover a conspiracy that is thousands of years in the making!
